subject: Football

College Athletics
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Football (College)
Fines (Penalties)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The manual for success in college sports often seems to center on finding ways around N.C.A.A. rules, entering gray areas and apologizing if you are caught.
snippet: The manual for success in college sports often seems to center on finding ways around N.C.A.A. rules, entering gray areas and apologizing if you are caught.
